medical_history.chief_complaint: Episodes of palpitations, pallor, visual disturbances, right flank pain, and anxiety, lasting several minutes and followed by exhaustion.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 4 months prior, occurring about once per week. Blood pressure during attacks reached 180/95 mm Hg. The patient was not on medications or dietary supplements at presentation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of right adrenalectomy for pheochromocytoma 13 years ago. Past medical history includes depression.
